DOC.criteria: Participants ( 1 ) patient advanced cancer receive care participate clinic ; ( 2 ) caregiver ; ( 3 ) oncology staff nurse , oncologist , practice manager . Patient eligibility criterion . Inclusion criterion : ( 1 ) adult ( ≥ 21 year old ) ; ( 2 ) metastatic solid tumor ; ( 3 ) oncologist `` would surprise patient die next year '' ; ( 4 ) Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group performance status ( ECOG PS ) ≤ 2 ; ( 5 ) planning receive ongoing care participate oncologist willing see least monthly . Exclusion criterion : ( 1 ) Unable read respond question English ; ( 2 ) cognitive impairment inability consent treatment , determine patient 's oncologist ; ( 3 ) unable complete baseline interview ; ( 4 ) ECOG PS 3 ( capable limit selfcare ; confine bed chair > 50 % waking hour ) 4 ( carry selfcare ; totally confine bed chair ) ; ( 5 ) hematologic malignancy . Caregiver eligibility criterion . Inclusion criterion : ( 1 ) adult ( ≥ 21 year old ) ; ( 2 ) family member friend eligible patient . Exclusion criterion : ( 1 ) unable read respond question English ; ( 2 ) unable complete baseline interview . Patients ask select caregiver person likely accompany visit help care need .
